name: 1inch
challengeTitle: NFT Marketplace on the 1inch Limit Order Protocol
challengeDesc: An adapter for creating limit orders over the 1inch Liquidity Protocol or over any decentralized exchange (DEX), based on their available liquidity.
benefitIntro: Our team has integrated the 1inch adapter containing isValidSignature, getMakerAmount (which calculates return amount based on DEX (“getReturn” function) and transferFrm (which triggers swaps and sends to takerAddress).
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX, for trading anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: Introduce an Avlanache Push Notification System (APNS.io) for greater mobile user engagement.
benefit3: Curate a community of trading experts that can trustlessly manage their Alpha Finance portfolios.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with 1inch.
